parameters.wtuc: weekly wage in transportation, utilities, communications

parameters.lwmfg: log of weekly wage in manufacturing
parameters.lcrmrte: log of crimes committed per person

parameters.lwloc: log of weekly wage in local government

parameters.ldensity: log of people per square mile
